DOC.brief_summary: This is a phase Ib follow-up study to evaluate long-term safety and tolerability of immunization with AFFITOPE AD03 applied during AFFiRiS 005A.
DOC.brief_title: Follow-up Study to Evaluate Long-term Safety and Tolerability of Immunization With AD03 Applied During AFF005A
